metadata.title: USN-6083-1 -- cups-filters vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that cups-filters incorrectly handled the beh CUPS backend. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause the backend to stop responding or to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6083-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libfontembed-dev - 1.28.16-1ubuntu0.2 libfontembed1 - 1.28.16-1ubuntu0.2 libcupsfilters-dev - 1.28.16-1ubuntu0.2 cups-filters - 1.28.16-1ubuntu0.2 cups-browsed - 1.28.16-1ubuntu0.2 cups-filters-core-drivers - 1.28.16-1ubuntu0.2 libcupsfilters1 - 1.28.16-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
